SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_purchase_order tpo JOIN tb_user tu USING (user_seq) JOIN tb_client tc USING (client_seq) LEFT JOIN tb_purchase_order_item tpoi ON (tpo.purchase_order_seq = tpoi.purchase_order_seq) LEFT JOIN tb_item ti ON (tpoi.item_seq = ti.item_seq)
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date
AND tc.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clientName}, '%')
AND tpo.purchase_order_status = #{purchaseOrderStatus}
